text: Bug: You can use a SVG as a company logo in account settings and by choosing a file from the file explorer. But you cannot upload a SVG directly via the logo field type (only through file explorer overlay)
is this necessarily a bug or just a different expectation than what is possible now?

<@UBT0AHWLD> I think it can be categorized as a bug, at least a bug for users who, as you say, expect a different behavior for SVG uploading. I think the backend should be consistent about dealing with allowed file types.
Thanks.
